Description_lang: Smites an enemy for $s1 Holy damage$?s231682[ and absorbs the next $<shield> damage dealt by the enemy]?s231687[ and has a $231687s1% chance to reset the cooldown of Holy Fire][].

description_blz.en_US: Smites an enemy for 3,951 Holy damage.
description_blz.es_MX: Golpea al enemigo y le inflige 3,928 p. de daño sagrado.
description_blz.pt_BR: Pune um inimigo, causando 3.875 de dano Sagrado.
description_blz.en_GB: Smites an enemy for 3,895 Holy damage.
description_blz.es_ES: Golpea a un enemigo, lo que inflige 3886 p. de daño Sagrado.
description_blz.fr_FR: Châtie un adversaire, ce qui lui inflige 3843 points de dégâts du sacré.
description_blz.it_IT: Colpisce un nemico, infliggendo 3.840 danni da sacro.
description_blz.ru_RU: Карает противника, нанося 3953 ед. урона от светлой магии.
description_blz.ko_KR: 성스러운 일격으로 적에게 3,842의 신성 피해를 입힙니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 懲擊一名敵人，造成3,828點神聖傷害。
description_blz.zh_CN: 惩击一名敌人，造成3,890点神圣伤害。
